vista.set
Class Pathname

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.Pathname
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Pathname
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Pathname is a DSS reference to the data stored. Its format is /A/B/C/D/E/F/ where each string between the slashes is called a pathname part.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getPartId

public int getPartId(java.lang.String part)
returns the index to the part of the pathname containing the string else returns -1; For anything more complex such as regular expression use filtering on parts

See Also:
DataReferenceFilter

setPart

public void setPart(int partId,
                    java.lang.String part)
Sets the part specified to the value specified. If the part specified is not found nothing is done. If the value is null then nothing is done.

getPart

public java.lang.String getPart(int partId)
Gets the part for the particular part identity as defined by the public variables ?_PART.

getFullPath

public java.lang.String getFullPath()
Returns:
the full pathname of the form /A_PART/B_PART/C_PART/D_PART/E_PART/F_PART/
